You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &lang;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Lang;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/27ea/index.htm U+027EA].
  * `&lang;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/27e8/index.htm U+027E8].
